title: Rent To Own Homes Starting at $2,000..
description:
❗️Why Buy Over Renting....❗️
Let's be frank: Buying a home is no small expense. Not only are there recurring property taxes and insurance payments to make, but maintenance and upkeep gets expensive, fast.
There is huge benefits. Consider that someday, your house might be worth more than you paid for it, and you'll move on at a profit. You might also have a potential for future passive income, if that's the route you want to take. And paying off your home to live mortgage-free can set you up for a comfortable retirement.
And then there's the emotional appeal of owning a home — the house is yours, and for some people, you can't put a price on that.
Buying versus renting a home is a very individual decision.
If you want to Rent, Lease To Own, Sell or Buy I am the girl for you!! Let's talk!

title: Welcome home to Madison Lansdale Station Apartments.
description:
Welcome home to Madison Lansdale Station Apartments. Brand new and joined with ground-level retail, our apartments in Lansdale, PA, are ready to become your urban nest of comfort and convenience. Pets allowed!
Filled to the brim with modern touches and luxurious details, our community stands proudly right in the heart of Downtown Lansdale. You can balance work and play effortlessly and enjoy the convenience of living in a carefully crafted, vibrant, and creative space. Our studios, one, and two-bedrooms all feature an open-concept layout with tall ceilings, modern lighting, USB outlets, full-size washers & dryers, stainless steel appliances, and everything else needed for a stress-free living experience.
Outside the comfort of our Lansdale apartments, you will find a well-equipped gym, billiards room with large TV, a clubhouse with a demo kitchen, and a private courtyard, all ready to entertain you and cater to your needs. Plus, with a host of boutiques, restaurants, and entertainment venues within walking distance from our community, dull moments will become a thing of the past as soon as you make Madison Lansdale Station Apartments your home.
You can also say goodbye to stressful commutes as we are STEPS away from SEPTA Regional Rail, which means you can reach Center City and top employers like Merck & CO. or Johnson & Johnson in no time. Not to mention that Montgomery Mall and the ever-evolving Main Street are just as close and ready to show you a good time. Find out more about our apartments for rent in Lansdale, PA, and email our team to set up a personal visit!

title: Exceptional 1 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom home
description:
Exceptional 1 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom home in a coveted boutique condominium building in Rittenhouse Square. The living and dining areas offer high ceilings, gleaming hardwood floors and a wall of windows which flood your space with an abundance of natural light. The generous living and dining area provides plenty of room for a work-from-home area or additional entertaining space. The gourmet kitchen features sleek cabinetry complemented by stainless appliances, chrome fixtures, rich granite countertops, pantry closet and a large breakfast bar. Beyond the living area is a pristine powder room and convenient laundry area. The luxe primary bedroom suite is a retreat spacious enough for all of your furniture plus desk space, along with a wall of closets and a dramatic black marble, windowed, en suite bathroom with frameless glass shower. A gracious entry, beautiful hardwood floors, excellent closet/storage space, and overhead lighting are just some of the special features. All this in a boutique condo building with a private courtyard and bike parking, mere steps from Rittenhouse Square. This is a truly central location with quick access to UPenn, Drexel, HUP and CHOP, 30th St Station, all major highways and public transportation. Rittenhouse Square is one of Philadelphia's most prized neighborhoods, featuring some of the city's best restaurants, shopping, nightlife, and recreation - you will love it here!

description:
Welcome Home! Stunning brick-front 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath twin in the popular Somerton neighborhood of Northeast Philly boasts brand new roof, replacement windows & blinds throughout, lush back yard with privacy fence, and spacious Trex deck with pergola! The large foyer has wide-plank tile flooring, custom front door, deep coat closet, and adorable nook for shoes & jackets. The second level includes the master suite with full bathroom and ample double closets. Three additional bedrooms are spacious, with fresh paint, large closets, 8 ft ceilings, and share a large hall bathroom. But wait - the fully finished basement boasts an enormous family room with wall-to-wall carpet, recessed lighting, and French doors leading to the patio and your private backyard oasis, designed to maximize your time spent outdoors relaxing and enjoying the company of family and friends. Don't forget the separate laundry room with extra storage, as well as the 1-car garage & driveway parking! Minutes from 232, Byberry Rd, Philmont Ave, Bustleton Ave, Roosevelt Blvd, Fox Chase, & Philmont Country Club ! This incredible home won't last long - schedule your showing today!

title: Wow! and Wow! Take advantage of the past and the present
description:
Wow! and Wow! Take advantage of the past and the present in this quiet-streeted neighborhood cutie that is mere steps from everything the main drag of Fishtown has to offer! Cuddle up to coziness when you step into this sweet home that dates to 1894 but offers the most gorgeous, brand new kitchen. Imagine this charming home with wood floors throughout, as well as a lovely fireplace and bronze covered, original coal chute smack in the middle of your living room! There, you can relax in the charming room and take your meals on the living room side of the windowed kitchen, so that you can talk to the designated cook who is diligently cooking your meals in the beautifully modern kitchen. In case the weather cooperates, you can also take your meals in your very own enclosed patio, accessible through your kitchen. Upstairs, you have two roomy bedrooms, a hall closet and a good sized bathroom. Relax in the gorgeous claw-foot tun or take that quick shower in the the modern stall shower.
